mapper.select: SELECT REPORT_NO, NICKNAME, TARGET_NICKNAME, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, REPORT_TITLE FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, REPORT_NO, NICKNAME, TARGET_NICKNAME, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, REPORT_TITLE FROM( SELECT REPORT_NO, NICKNAME, TARGET_NICKNAME, REPORT_TYPE, REPORT_CONTENT, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, REPORT_TITLE FROM REPORT ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < #{endRow}) WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow}
